job.title: Site Reliability Engineer - Elk Grove, CA / Austin or Dallas TX / Denver, CO / Seattle, WA
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtSeeking an experienced SRE responsible for engineering upkeep and automation of internet scale loadbalancing and proxy servicesltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtStrong knowledge of TCP HTTP DNS and SSL protocolsltbrgtltbrgtExperience with distributed systems in a production operations environmentltbrgtltbrgtSystems configuration management experience with automation tools such as Puppet Chef Ansible or SaltltbrgtltbrgtExperience with programming andor scripting languages Python Perl Java bash RubyltbrgtltbrgtSystems monitoring experience with tools such as Nagios Sensu Zabbix graphiteltbrgtltbrgtExperience with devops tools processes and cultureltbrgtltbrgtExperience with microservicescloud platforms such as Kubernetes a plusltbrgtltbrgtStrong communication skills and ability to work effectively across multiple business and technical teamsltbrgtltbrgtTroubleshooting of traffic flows at a deep level to find anomalies and to optimize performanceltbrgtltbrgtDemonstrated ability to deliver results on time with high qualityltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtThe Edge Traffic Delivery SRE team is a core engineering group with a mission of providing massively scaled loadbalancing and proxy solutions to many of Apples best known services  We are passionate about design implementation and support of our cuttingedge products  In addition to traffic engineering we often work with encryption technologies monitoringalerting cloud computing automation etc  ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking for a motivated devOps engineer who can work with internal customers then ultimately engineer deliver and maintain sophisticated solutions  Come join us and see what it means to Think Differentltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBS in Computer Science or equivalent experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtRole Number 200227180ltbrgtltbrgt
